page.title: 19Scotton/Northorpe Recreation
page.content: Gardening ranks high as a leisure activity, many people growing fruit and vegatables as well as raising flowers and grass. Car maintenance, even if no more than the occasional wash, is a general chore. Many people belong to one of the several village organisations (see Clubs page 16) or take part in the Whist, Indoor Bowls and Bingo evenings at the Village Hall. A number of people play bridge. Swimming (at Gainsborough or Scun- thorpe), keep fit and jogging are popular, some play badminton (at Scotter) or squash (Gainsborough) and Scotton's tennis court is much used. The "Three Horseshoes" pub at Scotton is part of the leisure scene. Young people at Northorpe have a play area with swings; youth clubs come and go in Scotton, a Youth Fellowship starts this autumn.Scouts/Guides at Scotter.
